tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mr. Arpan Saha is a nice person and very friendly. He started to treat my younger daughter for frequent snizzing issue. She is under his treatment now and we observed a bit improvement after starting medication. It will take time to complete the medicine courses as prescribed by him. We are satisfied with his way of diagnosis and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted the doctor online and he seemed very friendly. He explained to us the situation and prescribed medicines, although he suggested in clinic visitation for proper understanding of the problem (to which I agree). What was very surprising was that he himself messaged after 2 days to enquire about the well being of my kid. I would highly recommend Dr Arpan.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was in hurry. He did not ask even the age of the child. He took 10 seconds maximum on the call

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doc didn't give proper time to the patient, didn't explain the issue at all.  The consultation started and ended in total 68 seconds. Just asked the child what he was feeling and sent the prescription.

review: I made an online consultation with Dr Saha in practo when i failed to bring my son physically to any nearby doc and was utterly confused.He was very  much approachable and listened carefully .Whenever i had any doubt he was there .He made a good diagnosis of my son's persistent cough caused by asthmatic flare despite my first time visit.His treatment worked well and my son was on the way of fast recovery.I would definitely recommend him.
